response.original_title: Playboy: Secrets of Making Love... to the Same Person Forever, Volume II
response.overview: As all couples know, sharing your life and loves with a long-term partner is filled with many joyful moments, but also the occasional challenge. Learn how to overcome common problems and delight one another time and time again, for the rest of your lives. Join renowned therapist Dr. Joy Davidson, as she shows you how to turn sexual frustration and predictability into mutual excitement and delight. Reinvigorate a range of your most private moments with creative ideas for decisively breaking tired routines, savouring your partner's unique sexuality and learning how to expand your sexual horizons.
response.title: Playboy: Secrets of Making Love... to the Same Person Forever, Volume II
